Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; en-US; rv:1.9.2.15) Gecko/20110303 Lightning/1.0b2 Thunderbird/3.1.9

Compose and send a mail and minimize the window before the mail is completely sent. After a few seconds there will be a icon in the launch bar and when we click on it, it will show a new mail compose window.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click the 'Write' and compose a message.
2. Send the mail and minimize the compose window immediately.
3. The icon of the compose window is displayed in the launch bar.
Actual Results:  
Click on the icon and it shows a new 'Write' window.

Expected Results:  
The icon should be disappeared from the launch bar after the mail is sent successfully.
comments.creator: prasanthkumar.s@gmail.com
